category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 6 (Method and Matters of Announcement)
contents: Article 6 (Methods and Matters of Announcement) ① Announcements of the Foundation shall be published in general daily newspapers registered as distribution areas nationwide in accordance with the provisions of Article 9 (1) of the Act on the Promotion of Newspapers, etc. However, this does not apply to matters deemed minor. Revised 2020. 11. 5. ② Matters to be announced are as follows. Revised 2020. 11. 5. 1. Change in the name of the corporation and the location of the office 2. Other matters decided by the board of directors that it is necessary to widely inform the general public in carrying out the corporation's purpose business.
